briefTitle: Improving Obstructive Sleep Apnea Management Via Wireless Telemonitoring

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion criteria were:

1. Diagnosis of OSA
2. Prescription for CPAP treatment by a sleep physician
3. Being CPAP na√Øve (ie, no previous use of CPAP).

Exclusion criteria were:

1. Residence in a geographical area outside of San Diego County
2. Fatal comorbidity (life expectancy less than 6 months as indicated by treating physician)
3. Significant documented substance/chemical abuse

outcomeMeasures.title: Nightly CPAP Adherence
outcomeMeasures.description: Nightly CPAP adherence hours per night measured over the three-months period
